tutorial.speak:
To schedule lessons from Lessons.church in B1Admin, start by logging into B1Admin and navigating to the Serving section from the left sidebar.
In the Serving section, click on the Plans tab to access your service planning area.
If you don't have any plan types yet, click Create Plan Type to get started.
Enter a name for your plan type, such as Sunday Service or Children's Service.
Click Save to create your plan type.
Now click on your newly created plan type to open it.
Click the Create Plan button to add a new service plan to your calendar.
Enter a name and service date for your plan, then click Save.
Click on your plan to open it and begin scheduling your service.
Click on the Service Order tab to view and manage your service plan.
Click the Associate Lesson button to add a lesson from Lessons.church to your service order.
Select your Program, Study, Lesson, and Venue from the cascading dropdowns, then click Associate Lesson to add it to your service.
Once the lesson is added, you can click the Customize button to modify the lesson for your specific needs.
In the customization view, you can drag the segment handles to reorder activities and click the edit icons to modify each segment.
Drag segments to the blue drop zones to reorder your lesson activities to match your service flow.
To add additional sections to your service, click the Add Section button. Enter a name for your section in the header field.
Type a name such as Small Group or Large Group, then click Save.
Your new section appears in the service order. Click the plus icon next to the section name to add content.
You can add different types of content: Songs, Items, Lesson Actions, or Add-Ons. Click on Add-On to browse available resources.
Browse the available add-ons by category. For example, select a scripture song to include in your service.
Once you've selected your add-on, click the Select Add-On button to add it to your section.
To display your lesson on a TV, navigate back to your plan by clicking on the plan name.
Click the Pair TV App button in the top right corner.
Download the Lessons.church TV App from Google Play Store or Amazon App Store, then enter the 4-character code displayed on your TV screen to pair it. Your lesson is now ready to present on the big screen.
